Consumable.Name: Elixir of Vitality
Consumable.Description: A rare potion that restores health and enhances the drinker's physical endurance.
Consumable.Effects: Heals 40 health points; +5 to Constitution for 5 minutes
Consumable.UniqueProperties: StorylineRelevance: Discovered in the ruins of an ancient temple, this elixir is said to be a gift from the gods.

Consumable.Name: Shadowmist Brew
Consumable.Description: A dark, swirling potion that grants the drinker the ability to become as elusive as a shadow.
Consumable.Effects: Invisibility for 15 seconds; +2 Dexterity for 10 minutes
Consumable.UniqueProperties: StorylineRelevance: Brewed by the Nightwalkers, a secretive clan of assassins, to aid in their covert operations.

Consumable.Name: Arcane Dust
Consumable.Description: Fine dust that, when thrown into the air, significantly amplifies magical energy.
Consumable.Effects: Increases Mana regeneration rate by 50% for 3 minutes
Consumable.UniqueProperties: StorylineRelevance: Said to be the remnants of a fallen star, imbued with pure arcane power.
